Class EOForm

                                      |
                                      +--com.webobjects.eointerface.swing.EOForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accessible, ImageObserver, LayoutManager, MenuContainer, NSDisposable, Serializable
public class EOForm
extends EOMatrix
implements LayoutManager

EOForm is a subclass of EOMatrix that manages a collection of labelled text fields laid out on a grid. Each label/text field pair is an EOFormCell.

See Also:
EOMatrix, EOFormCell, Serialized Form
